subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: Utter/Ado
msgSnippet: ... I know nothing about modifying Uniscribe. -- John Cowan   cowan@ccil.org    http://ccil.org/~cowan I come from under the hill, and under the hills and over
messageBody:
Anthony Grahn scripsit:

> That's very flattering but if you have an idea about putting some
> hooks into the Uniscribe DLL don't let me dissuade you. Indeed I have
> some QS handling java code that you may find useful and could be
> ported to C for the purpose if you're interested.

I know nothing about modifying Uniscribe.

--
John Cowan cowan@... http://ccil.org/~cowan
I come from under the hill, and under the hills and over the hills my paths
led. And through the air. I am he that walks unseen. I am the clue-finder,
the web-cutter, the stinging fly. I was chosen for the lucky number. --Bilbo
